crew:
Marella Averill Doug Averill USCG OUPV ABYC Marine Electrical Advisor

3,500 nm coastal and offshore
specs:
General Information

Commissioned: July 2007 (hull nr 31)

Hull Number: CON50031E707

Lloyd's Register: AMS 0702612/12

Yard: Contest Yachts - Medemblik, Holland

Designer: Georg Nissen

Hull: Vacuum injection GRP

Mast: Selden

Length hull: 14.99 meters

Beam: 4.58 meters

Draft: 2.15 meters

Vertical clearance: 23.5 meters

Light ship displacement: 21.500 kg

Bulbed fin keel: 6100 kg

Rudder: Balanced fin aluminium re-enforced

CE code: CE-A Ocean

Anchoring: Spade S180 with 70m chain; Electrical windlass

Tender: AB Lammina 9.5UL with 2019 Honda 9.9 outboard

Davits: Stainless steel Simpson 125 (manual)

Canvas: Sprayhood with grab rail, Cockpit cover, Bimini (New 2025), Cockpit cushions

Safety: EPIRB (McMurdo), Switlik MOM-8, Two throwable horseshoes, Radar reflector (Cyclops 2), Electric/Manual bilge pumps

Life raft: Model- Ocean Ultra light 6 (for 6pax)

  • Mfg. 2012
  • Serial #4R2031261A2515
  • Last serviced- 05/2023
  • Last serviced by- LRSE, Tiverton, RI
  • Painter- 9 Meters

Additional: Stainless steel bathing ladder and bow ladder, deck shower, teak pushpit seats


Engine & Propulsion

Main Engine: Yanmar 4JH4-HTE (110 HP / 80.96 kW)

Fuel Type: Diesel

Drive System: Shaft drive with stainless steel shaft (water lubricated)

Propeller: 3-blade feathering Maxprop

Bow Thruster: Electric Sleipner 24V (10 HP)

Speed: Max 8.5 kn / Cruising 7.5 kn

Cooling: Freshwater heat exchanger with separator

Engine Room Fire Suppression: Fire pro-system (replaced new 2025)

Genset: Mastervolt Whisper 6 - 5kva 230vac 50 hz

Electrical Systems

Voltage: 12V / 24V / 220V

Generator: Mastervolt Whisper 6.5 kW (50Hz)

Batteries:

  • Service: 8 12VDC Lifeline 125Ah AGM (series parallel 24V) – New 2025
  • Start : 1 Optima Redtop for both Genset and Engine with manual Service batt override

Charging/Inverter: Mastervolt Combi 24V/4000W/120A; Mastervolt 24V to 12V inverter

Shore Power: Yes, with cable and Victron Auto isolation transformer

Watermaker: Schenker READY 60

Solar: 6 (3x2) - 138 watt Solbian panels on three Victron Smart Solar 75/15 MPPT


Water & Plumbing

Fuel: Approx. 800L (Polyethylene) with level indicator

Freshwater: Approx. 800L (Polyethylene, in two tanks) with level indicator

Blackwater: 2x 45L (Polyethylene) with deck and underwater extraction

Hot Water: 40L Webasto boiler

Water Pressure: Marco UP6/E 12/24V Electronic Water Pressure Pump, 6.9 GPM, 1/2 in. NPT, 6.6 ft. Self-Priming


Navigation Equipment


Sails & Rigging

Mast: Seldén aluminium (white coated), stoway layout with 3 pairs of spreaders

Rigging Type: Fractionally rigged 9/10 with wire standing rigging

Furling Systems:

  • Main: Hydraulic in-mast furling
  • Genoa: Furlex hydraulic reefing system

Winches (Electric):

  • Primary: 2x Lewmar 48ST
  • Genoa: 2x Lewmar 65ST
  • Halyard: 2x Lewmar 54ST

Sails:

  • Mainsail: Elvstrom (vertical battens, 2025)
  • Genoa: Elvstrom (with UV ply, 2026) – 107%
  • Code: Elvstrom (sewn in torsion and UV, 2026)
  • Jib: #3 North Sails 2015
  • Gennaker: Quantum 2023

Equipment: Carbon spinnaker pole, Navtec hydraulic backstay adjuster, Seldén Rodkicker boom vang
